_sText:
This map is a modification of the original GoldSrc 2Fort from Team Fortress Classic, retextured and modified for gun game. It is only the bridge and the 2 forts.

Due to my converting the GoldSrc version of the map to a Source-compatible .vmf there are quite a few small leaks in some of the brushes, a lot I have fixed. Nothing bad and not too noticeable unless you look for them. I will try to fix some of these in future updates.


Update Notes:

V2:
- Fixed some light leaks (My benefit, to optimize compile time)
- Made part of the bridge breakable.
- Added water into the pit to avoid fall damage.
- Added lights in the sniper towers.
- Added a secret room.

V3:
- Fixed more light leaks (My benefit, to optimize compile time)
- Fixed breakable bridge.
- Made light fixtures for the lights in the forts.
- Adjusted the ladders to a slight angle.

To Do:
- Make the breakable bridge brush more complex.
- Fix most, if not all light leaks.
- Fix brush glitches.
- Make map HDR (Not until all light leaks are fixed).
- Fix brush alignment/blends.

Final notes: It seems like every time I fix one thing, 2 more problems pop up.
